analysis.description:
BitUnits.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#263-274) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 1

BitUnits.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#263-274) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 1
BitUnits.getProofOfStakeReward (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#276-297) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 1
empty in BitUnits.transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#193-196) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in BitUnits.transferToContract (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#216-235):
	External calls:
	- reciever.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#223-224)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- transferIns (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#224-226)
	- transferIns (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#227-231)
	- transferIns (/unique_chucks/19/0x8647d204b30c9292d92e4d52e783331947ea2ffa.sol#231-232)
